description: Example project-level font configuration. Copy this to your project's config to customize inaccessible font detection.

notes: use_defaults: Set to true to include the system's default inaccessible fonts list
additional_inaccessible_fonts: Add project-specific fonts that should be flagged as inaccessible
excluded_fonts: Remove specific fonts from the default list if your project requires them
All font names should be lowercase for consistent matching
